So time to cal gist should be O(N), ~  160 s for N = 4000
time to cal distance should be O(N^2) ~ 200 s for N = 4000
To sum it up, the diff should be 400 in total at most. 
I will take 7 mins to get the result. But after 15 mins, ... no ....
